title: When you hear triple kill top lane when your just casually farming bot lane

replies.body: Lets hope it wasn't the enemy toplane

Enemy {{champion:86}} :Triple kill!
{{champion:67}} & {{champion:37}} < 20% health 
Sees enemy teleport  behind them
*both flash*

I've done that with darius.

mana denied me my penta
{{champion:122}} Heh...

What is Broken...{{champion:92}} 
has obtained a triple kill

> What is Broken...

...can be reforged?
It can, but Riot chooses not to.
{{champion:23}} tho.  I feel like he's the most fun top laner to snowball with

when that happens i go down there and kill the enemy adc and support then again i used to main mid and now i have decided to main jungle
so it's pretty easy for me to kill the bot lane
Usually when that happens,I say,"Well,this is going to be a tough one."
And you pray to god that it's your top laner that got it.
{{champion:81}} when your toplane belongs in a museum
because hes history?

you've never played ezreal, have you?
https://youtu.be/5QNFKdeukIg
no I have, I was just giving an actual punchline to his joke
because he belongs in a museum. Duh

Enemy Riven with a tripple kill

Going to be a long 20 minutes I see.
You will remember {{champion:83}}

well I don't play top lane often.
But when I do, I run exhaust ignite.
:^]
Do you also drink dos equis?

idk what that is.
I usually drink water though.

Nice name btw lol

LOL. I may have misspelled the name, but it's the beer from the "most interesting man in the world" commercials. The line they use is "I don't always drink beer, but when I do, I prefer dos equis." So your format fits it, and is also kinda funny bc it's just going ham in lane.
oic, I'd probably laugh if I watched TV at all to get the commerical or didn't have ad block on google chrome always on.
I think the spelling is correct, although it would be easier to just say XX
Don't worry I got the joke! Nice one :D
thats so op i use that when i use wu top XD
I get those all the time with Rumble =D
{{champion:58}} you're welcome.

I wanted to make my summoner name swain bot.  twas the night before Christmas (I promise im not gonna give you a poem, just had to do that) when I got on to collect my summoner name that would be available that night at about 11 pm when I saw that the guy had played 1 game. 1 freaking game.
{{champion:75}} Thanks for the +18.
Isn't usually the other way around tho? Top laners doing their nothing and then the rest of the map having skirmishes? How often is there even 3 of one team top?
mid and jg gank. seen 4 in lcs once forget when though...penta gank
Brace yourselves. . . a fed enemy is coming. . .
When they tele bot after getting fed AND I'm low i just run to gromp. would rather die to gromp than feed darius :)
When that happens I just suicide under enemy tower lmao
{{champion:58}} - "Oh!  Your jungler and mid lander came to save your sorry butt?  Thanks for the triple sucker!"
Now this is a funny meme
{{champion:27}}
{{champion:82}} I know the lane you speak of- it is quite enjoyable.
I main top and most of the time it is just me casually farming and I hear that random bot lane double/triple kill and I'm all like "meanwhile in bot lane..."
Your... your... your... YOUR? YOUR? YOUR YOUR YOUR YOUR YOUR? You're*
Ewww R.Kelly....

Poor sentence structure AND you used the wrong "you're"

Perfect storm.
